mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travlePlan SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, startDate = #{startDate}, city = #{city}
mapper.select: SELECT TP.* FROM travlePlan AS TP INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON TP.memberId = M.id WHERE TP.id = #{id} GROUP BY TP.id
SELECT TP.* ,M.nickname AS `writerName` FROM travlePlan AS TP INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON TP.memberId = M.id WHERE TP.boardId = #{boardId} GROUP BY TP.id ORDER BY TP.id DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM travlePlan WHERE boardId = #{boardId}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
